name: Ricochet (itch) (Placeholder Interactive)
description:
Ricochet is a game about life, a game about who we are as people and what we all experience. A game about what we would do if we had a bullets that could bounce. And a patented triple movement system.

Controls:

WASD / Left Stick - Movement

Cursor / Right Stick - Aim

Space / RB - Jump

Left Click / RT - Shoot

R / X - Reload

F / Y - Interact

Left Shift / LB - Dash

P - Reset to last checkpoint

Thanks for playing!
